Reviews.Title: Easy installation 5 stars
Reviews.Author: Sam Taco
Reviews.Content: I Took about 15 min's to set up, and works perfectly. It look nicer and work better than the cheap cameras that came with my system. and wider angle as well, The night vision is good for the area I have it in which is my front porch area that is able 8ft high and 4ft by 4ft, the LED's can be seen but seem to be dimmer then my other cameras and do stand out as much.. Very easy to mount with up to 4 screws through a detachable base.Great camera for the price.4 starsI purchased this camera to replace another dome camera. This camera has good resolution and color quality. It covered the entire front yard from a high point on a single home. The camera can be adjusted to view video in any direction  it is essentially plug-and-play so it was no big deal. Adjusting the direction is easy (unscrew the outter casing to loosen the grip, adjust the camera, and retighten). Image quality using IR in the dark was reasonable. Daytime vision is good in shady areas, but the instruction are vague, and Works better in daylight than at night. Thus the 4 stars instead of 5, but all-in-all a reasonable device that does what it's supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: E. Samonte
Reviews.Content: Great quality, cheap and easy to install.  I just swapped out my old camera and put this one in its place.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Pali "numero 1"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to work with my defender system which came with bullet cameras.  The body is sturdy metal and the quality of the picture both day and night is far superior to the "high" resolution cameras that came with the system.  I switched this with the existing bullets and images are much sharper and clearer both night and day, and captures more space.  I am now going to replace the bullets with these.  For the price and quality it's a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Conch-shaped dome camera
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Good camera, I like itI purchased this camera to monitor my store. It is a good value for the money.This camera is easy to set up and install. The small size and  conch-shaped appearance is very suitable for the indoor environment and fully adjustable for wall or ceiling mounting. And it is strongly solid with the Metal shell instead of the usual cheap plastic.3.6mm lens provides a wid*e view angle, so 2 conch-shaped camera is enough for my store. It captures my entire store, so i can easily monitor it on my computer without going around and observation. Now i can manage the store myself without any employee. As for the image quality, it's clear in daytime but a bit out of focus at night. However it's much better than those cameras which the DVR system comes with. Additionally, i find that there is not security decal, anyway, this item is worth price.Hope the seller can read the review and make some improvements.

Reviews.Title: very nice camera.
Reviews.Author: David J. Wheeler
Reviews.Content: Its just as describe.The picture is clear and only problem is you will likely need to buy longer cables. It seems well built and not all cheap. case is metal.It looks nice too.A+ shipping wast fast.

Reviews.Title: VERY PLEASED INDEED
Reviews.Author: HMH "hmichael0330"
Reviews.Content: I received this CCTV camera recently and decided to install it in my house just in case someone decides to break into my house.  First off,I must say the unit is well made, small, about 3 inches wide, metal casing - NOT plastic, off-white color which blends in quite nicely with my wall, picture quality is acceptable considering that it's only 420TVL and not 700TVL, otherwise it would not be so cheap.  ***The "wide angle" part is questionable and that's my reason for not giving it a 5 star rating. The IR works very well at night, I was able to see myself in the dark and also the motion sensor was quick to give me away even in complete darkness.  Bottom Line - If you are looking for an inexpensive CCTV camera just to put in your house or  to look over the yard or garage and don't want to spend a fortune, you might want to consider this one.NOTE - Also keep in ind that this unit DOES NOT come with BNC to RCA adapter which you will need to plug it into your DVR or TV.

Reviews.Title: FAKE REVIEWS- 5 reviews on same date with no other reviews
Reviews.Author: Donna "donmarvin"
Reviews.Content: There are 5 reviews dated Jan 20, 2013, none verified purchases, and all 5 reviewers had no other reviews except for an alarm clock (2 people with the same alarm clock).They didn't even TRY to make it look real.

Reviews.Title: good build and quality
Reviews.Author: Henry
Reviews.Content: i was surprise to see a very good quality for the price of this camera, i highly recommend for everyone.

Reviews.Title: Best bang-for-the-buck in NTSC day/night cameras
Reviews.Author: Roman Pennington
Reviews.Content: I've got a half dozen of these installed and have had them running for at least 6 months without any issues.  I've had cheaper cameras where the IR LEDs would  quickly die.  These are well-made and high quality.  I'm very pleased and am ordering more.

Reviews.Title: Solid construction. Sharp image. Great night quality.
Reviews.Author: David L. "D"
Reviews.Content: After trying other products I feel very satisfied, especially for the price. this is way beyond the quality I had expected. Metal construction, quality picture, great night viewing, just an overall good product. I will be ordering the second one shortly here.

Reviews.Title: One of the better cameras for the money
Reviews.Author: Chris Jenkins
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a replacement camera for my DVR system after 3 of my cameras got took out by a lightning strike. Iv'e had this for over a year now and purchased two of another brand at the same time. This is the only one I've ever had that has kept it's night vision all the others seem to go dark over time. This is a very well made camera and has held up well in the weather. I have it mounted under eave at the corner of my house and it receives lots of wind, rain, and snow. The design allows you to position it and then tighten it down so it stays in place which it does very well, I've never had to re adjust it. It is slightly difficult to position and rather confusing if you have taken it out of the shell to get everything lined up and mounted correctly with the camera in the proper orientation. But overall a good camera for the price. I will probably order more to replace the others if I don't upgrade to IP cameras.

Reviews.Title: a very good device
Reviews.Author: JOHN
Reviews.Content: When some IR lights burned out on another type of camera I got a couple of these as replacements... a very crisp picture, better that most on IR. Pretty well built to. No complaints in a couple months of service. .  .

Reviews.Title: CCTV Camera with Night Vision
Reviews.Author: N. R. "Handy Mandy"
Reviews.Content: Quality is OK, not the best camera on our system but we got to change an older one that died. This rather good in price, installation was a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Mounted on
Reviews.Author: Craig M.
Reviews.Content: Good resolution works well mounted in dash of semi truck.Seems to have good night vision.Solid well built metal.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: E. Cady
Reviews.Content: These cameras are not high definition, but I have no need for that High definition.  The cameras function very nicely giving consistent pictures from camera to camera.  I am using them in our home in the Philippines to monitor activity around the house and yard.  Plan to install at our store and business to monitor guests and employees.

Reviews.Title: Great item for the price
Reviews.Author: Anthony Meads
Reviews.Content: Great item for the price.  Clear view with a good wide view for this lower priced camera. I would buy more.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Rechael.H
Reviews.Content: I have many different types of cctv cameras around my house that I use in my system, and I have to say this one is the best of all , the housing is cute like conch ,the camera works well and the image is clear, in both night and day settings. I prefer wide-angle lens for home surveillance ,IR lights are visible to the naked eye, but are definitely powerful enough. They lit up a 25ft long room with no problem at all. I'm glad this unit includes a CCD instead of a CMOS chip, as the quality of the image is so much better!Unlike many other cameras, this one did not include a cable to hook into your DVR. I don't find that to be a problem, but it will add to the cost of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Used is great
Reviews.Author: britta
Reviews.Content: Used one is cheaper, and the condition indicated item just some sractches on housing, it is not a big deal, camera works well, I will buy more used one.

Reviews.Title: More than expected
Reviews.Author: KerS
Reviews.Content: I am glad to buy this camera , it is good enough for day N night vision,image just not color but white/black at night. Anyway, it can meet my need.

Reviews.Title: Mine were not NTSC but PAL cameras.
Reviews.Author: Farron L. Haley
Reviews.Content: I could not use the cameras because they were not compatible with my DVR or anything else I have. They are the wrong video standard for use in the U.S. Otherwise they looked like a very good quality camera. Too Bad. I lost the shipping cost on them and tossed them out.

Reviews.Title: bad recption
Reviews.Author: jimmy
Reviews.Content: I wish this camera had a clearier view i put it at window and all it picks up at nite is the scree. In rhe window and nuthing outside

Reviews.Title: Good for home protection
Reviews.Author: kristy156
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera if your protecting just your home, but when it comes to your children, new borns anything, you will want one that is made just for that purpose and its worth it!http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001FB567U/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B001FB567U&linkCode;=as2&tag;=wwwworkoutwei-20

Reviews.Title: Great item for its price!
Reviews.Author: amanda
Reviews.Content: I have been focusing on LOFTEK camera since 2011,what I have to say most of their items with very good quality as what they advertised! The page you are viewing at is also pretty good since I purchased last June. I strongly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: It is Better than I expected
Reviews.Author: shuhua Luo
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 security cams from Videosecu, including a waterproof CCTV and one day night vision dome cam (420TVL), which also looks like a conch. Due to the expansion of my store, I ordered this camera from newegg for its low price last month. To my astonishment, it is almost the same as the Videosecu. Both of them have the following pros and cons:1. Easy installation and operation.2. Small size and compact design.3. Clear image provided by 420 TVL and 3.6mm lens.4. Having problems to connecting to Wi-Fi.5. Without zoom functions.However, Loftek has 4 more IR LED and lower price than Videosecu.The important things is its shell made of hard metal So I would like to recommend this one to you guys.

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase!
Reviews.Author: FayeH
Reviews.Content: Night vision is Ok, however the color is not good at all.  Would not recommend this product and currently I am searching for a better quality camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
24 IR LEDs for night vision, Minimum Illumination:0 Lux
1/3" HD Sony CCD image sensor, 420TVL, NTSC system
3.6mm Lens for wide view angle, Ideal for indoor(IR distance:20m)
Small size(3.34" x2.20" ), Easy installation
Excellent Quality Metal Shell not Plastic.
ProductInfo.Name: LOFTEK® Conch-shaped dome 24 Infrared LEDs Day/Night Vision Security CCTV Camera Color CCD Video camera Sony 420TVL 3.6mm Wide View Angle Lens. built with high-quality metal housing . White.
